levelList.name: With Love!
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 5 (sum of [Burst] and [Sinking] on target) (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain +10 [PowerOfLoveAndJustice]

levelList.name: In the Name of Justice!
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 7 (sum of [Burst] and [Sinking] on target) (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain +10 [PowerOfLoveAndJustice] Count

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If target has 10+ (sum of [Burst] and [Sinking]), inflict 1 [Binding] next turn

levelList.name: Arcana Beats
levelList.desc:
Mainly targets 'The Knight of Despair'
Sub-targets the ally with the most [ColdBlackTear]
- If there are none, sub-targets the ally with the least HP
Inflicts 0 damage and does not activate the effects of [Sinking] and [ColdBlackTear] against allies

[WinDuel] Remove 1 [ColdBlackTear] from the sub-targeted ally

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If target is an enemy, Inflict 1 [Burst]
[OnSucceedAttack] If target is an ally, heal 5 HP
[OnSucceedAttack] If target is an enemy, Inflict 1 [Burst]
[OnSucceedAttack] If target is an ally, heal 5 HP
[OnSucceedAttack] If target is an enemy, Inflict 1 [Burst]
[OnSucceedAttack] If target is an ally, heal 5 HP

levelList.name: Looks Like I'll Have to Use This Power!
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] Gain 1 [ChasingArcana]
[StartBattle] Gain 50 Shield
[StartBattle] Gain 20 [Aggro] next turn

levelList.name: Chanting - Arcana Slave
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] Gain 50 Shield
[StartBattle] Gain 20 [Aggro] next turn
[EndBattle] At 0 Shield HP, Retreats

levelList.name: ARCANA SLAVE
levelList.desc:
[CantDuel]
Does not deal damage against Sword of a Forgotten Knight
Ends Turn when hitting enemies with [WornOutKnight]
[EndBattle] Gain [UsedTooMuchPower]

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Reduce target's HP to (100 - ([CollapsedPride] Stack x 33))%

levelList.name: ARCANA SLAVE
levelList.desc:
[CantDuel]
Deals damage only with Coin effects
Does not deal damage against Heart-breaking Sword, Heart-tearing Sword, and Heart-piercing Sword
Ends Turn when hitting enemies that has [WornOutKnight] and 600- HP
[EndBattle] Gain [UsedTooMuchPower]

levelList.name: Looks Like I'll Have to Use This Power!
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] Gain 1 [ChasingArcanahard]
[StartBattle] Gain 50 Shield
[StartBattle] Gain 20 [Aggro] next turn
